resources.string: This application is easy to use for JOYOS ROM. It needs ROOT permission to create and mount SWAP partition. The process time of creating SWAP maybe long (about a few minutes), because SWAP size you choose maybe large. So please wait for it patiently. After creating successfully, please click SWAP Status button to check its status. If you want to re-create it, please click Clear SWAP button first, and then reboot phone, create it again.
Please click Create SWAP Button, and wait patiently ...
No enough space in DATA partitionï¼Œplease re-choose SWAP size
No enough space in SYSTEM partition, please re-choose SWAP size
No enough space in SDCARD partition, please re-choose SWAP size
Please choose SWAP partition and szie
Clear SWAP partition successfully! If you want to re-create SWAP partition, please reboot phone at first!

You are choosing SDCARD to create swap partition. After creating SWAP partition, the phone can not use USB Mass Storage mode to connect your computer. If you want to use UMS mode, please click Clear SWAP button and reboot your phone.
